oMeta.description: In Mark TwainÍs classic tale of friendship and adventure, Huckleberry Finn escapes his evil, drunken father, befriends a runaway slave named Jim, and sails the Mississippi River! As Huck and Jim sail to freedom, they encounter con men and thieves and get in plenty of trouble along the way. Follow HuckÍs coming-of-age journey in the Calico Illustrated Classics adaptation of TwainÍs The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn. Calico Chapter Books is an imprint of Magic Wagon, a division of ABDO Group. Grades 3-8.
oMeta.title: Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
